copy: At Clearlink I am helping to create a custom CMS using Gatsby and Contentful. I was promoted from a front end developer position where I would create SEO driven websites to generate new customers for our brand partners.
Calldrip is a small software company based in Utah. I functioned as a full stack developer helping them to add features and improve their web-based customer lead generation software.
I worked for the United States Air Force as a civilian during college. I worked for the software maintenance group working on f-16's.

My first dev job. I did customer support and added small features and tweaks to Chitester, Weber State's own testing software. It was my first opportunity to work with a large existing production codebase.
